price: Musa yarongeye ababwira ati: “N’aho mwogarariza Imana Allah mwebwe hamwe n’abari mw’isi bose, nta co mwoyitwara namba. Nimumenye mu vy’ukuri, ko Imana Allah ari Uwikenuye Yikenuye muri vyose; Nyenugushimwa, Ishimwa ku mazina, ku matazirano no ku bikorwa vyayo mu bihe vyose”.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun
